alert.note: Alert for Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 02 at 1:25PM MST until February 02 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Sheridan County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 8 PM MST this evening. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 8 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
